name: Tommy Tronic
description: Tommy Tronic - an old-skool platformer that isn't trying to be anything else! Jumping, shooting, dodging and exploring is all that's required to help get Tommy to his destination and free his tiny puppy from the clutches of an insane genius school-kid and his brutal sidekick 'Biffa'.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, Win 7Processor: 1 GB or higherMemory: 512mbGraphics: GeForce 2 (32mb) equivalent or higherDirectX®: 7 or higherHard Drive: 80mbSound: Windows compatible sound card
